demons.\""},{"lineNumber":171303,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺様より強い種から生まれた魔人ばかりでなぁ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They were demons born from species stronger than death...\""},{"lineNumber":171307,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その後も、色んな奴が魔王になった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"After that, many different people became Demon increased.\""},{"lineNumber":171310,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔王スラルや魔王ナイチサはその頃の魔王だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Demon Lord Slal and Demon Lord Naichisa were Demon Lords of that time."},{"lineNumber":171311,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様は何代も何代も魔王に仕え続けた」","translatedEnglishLine":"I continued to serve many generations of Demon Lords.\""},{"lineNumber":171312,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただひたすら強くなりたいと努力し、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I simply put all my effort into wanting to become stronger,"},{"lineNumber":171313,"originalJapaneseLine":"　毎日逃げ回る日々を送っていた頃……","translatedEnglishLine":"and lived each day running away...\""},{"lineNumber":171314,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いつの間にか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Before I knew it..."},{"lineNumber":171315,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様は最古参の魔人になっていた」","translatedEnglishLine":"I had become the longest-serving demon.\""},{"lineNumber":171316,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と言っても強さは中の下、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Though my strength was average to below average,"},{"lineNumber":171317,"originalJapaneseLine":"　昔からいるだけってのが自慢の弱っちい奴」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was just a weakling proud of having been around for so long.\""},{"lineNumber":171318,"originalJapaneseLine":"「用心に用心を重ねなければ生きていくことすら","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If I didn't take precautions over precautions,"},{"lineNumber":171319,"originalJapaneseLine":"　到底俺にはできなかった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"there was no way I could survive...\""},{"lineNumber":171320,"originalJapaneseLine":"「生まれてから3000年ほど過ぎた頃……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Around 3000 years after I was born...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……行きましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Let's go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、無理して戦う必要はないな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, there’s no need to force ourselves to fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「行くぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's go!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部屋からランス達が去って行く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others left the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怠惰の魔人、カミーラは何を思っているのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What was the demon of laziness, Camilla, thinking?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気だるげに一人の部屋で俯いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She sat listlessly alone in her room, looking down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「げはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gehahaha ha ha ha ha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスは自室でシャリエラを相手に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kebris, in his room, was talking to Shaliera,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思い出話を一方的に語っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: recounting memories in a one-sided fashion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王ククルククル、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Demon Lord Kukurukukuru,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間違いなく俺様が知る限り最強の魔王だが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: without a doubt the strongest Demon Lord I know...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その天下も終わりを告げるときが来た」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The time came to mark the end of his reign.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――魔王ククルククルを倒したドラゴン、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—The dragon who defeated Demon Lord Kukurukukuru,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王アベルの誕生だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the birth of Demon Lord Abel."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王ってなぁ死なねぇんだと思ってた俺には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought Demon Lords never died, so for me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その新しい世界の支配者は衝撃なんてもんじゃなかったぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the emergence of that new ruler of the world was nothing short of shocking."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっと、誤解すんじゃねーぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, don't get me wrong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アベルがククルククルより強かったわけじゃねえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Abel wasn't stronger than Kukurukukuru."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ククルククルはドラゴン種全てと戦っていて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kukurukukuru fought all kinds of dragons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまたまアベルがトドメを刺したってだけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Abel just happened to deliver the finishing blow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでもアベルも想像もつかない程に強かったぜ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Still, Abel was unimaginably strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、魔王としちゃ色々と変な奴だったがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, he was a weird guy in many ways for a Demon Lord."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「歴代の魔王でも最高に狡猾で臆病だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He was the craftiest and most cowardly among all Demon Lords in history.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へへっ、だが、俺はそれは正しいと思ったぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh, but I thought that was the right way to be."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんたって、世の中、ククルククルだって死ぬんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After all, even Kukurukukuru dies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんならこの世に信じられる絶対のものなんてねえじゃねぇか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So nothing in this world can be absolutely trusted."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ？　ククルククルの仇討ちはしなかったのかだって？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? You ask if I didn't avenge Kukurukukuru?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「馬ー鹿、なんで俺があんなタコの化け物の仇なんぞ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Idiot! Why would I avenge that octopus monster..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様はもちろん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course, I..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐにアベルにすり寄り忠誠を誓ったぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: immediately swayed close to Abel and swore loyalty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様が逆らったところで、なーんの意味もねぇ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There’s no point in opposing him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普通はそうするだろ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Any sane person would do the same, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王アベルには沢山のことを教わったぜ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I learned a lot from Demon Lord Abel..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どんなに強い奴だって死ぬ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No matter how strong someone is, they die..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦いってなぁ、勝てるって確証が得られるまではしねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You fight only when you can be sure you'll win."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「惚れた女は力で手に入れても意味がねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Winning over the woman you love by force is meaningless."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へっ、教わったことはまあ色々だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh, I've learned all sorts of things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アベルは自分の血を分け与えて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Abel shared his own blood,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人の数を増やした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: increasing the number of demons."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様より強い種から生まれた魔人ばかりでなぁ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They were demons born from species stronger than me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃の俺様はまだ魔人と名乗るのもおこがましい弱さだった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and at that time, I was too weak to even call myself a demon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「肩身が狭い……なんてもんじゃねえ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I felt ashamed... that’s an understatement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この頃はまだ毎日が生きるか死ぬかだったぜ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back then, every day was a matter of life or death..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その後も、色んな奴が魔王になった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After that, many different people became Demon Lords."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつしかドラゴンをめっきり見なくなった頃……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the time dragons had become rarely seen...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間なんて意味の分からねぇチビが増えてた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: humans, those incomprehensible little beings, increased."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王スラルや魔王ナイチサはその頃の魔王だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Demon Lord Slal and Demon Lord Naichisa were Demon Lords of that time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様は何代も何代も魔王に仕え続けた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I continued to serve many generations of Demon Lords."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただひたすら強くなりたいと努力し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I simply put all my effort into wanting to become stronger,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毎日逃げ回る日々を送っていた頃……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and lived each day running away..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつの間にか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Before I knew it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様は最古参の魔人になっていた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I had become the longest-serving demon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と言っても強さは中の下、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Though my strength was average to below average,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昔からいるだけってのが自慢の弱っちい奴」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was just a weakling proud of having been around for so long."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「用心に用心を重ねなければ生きていくことすら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I didn't take precautions over precautions,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 到底俺にはできなかった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was no way I could survive..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「生まれてから3000年ほど過ぎた頃……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Around 3000 years after I was born..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……行きましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Let's go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、無理して戦う必要はないな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, there’s no need to force ourselves to fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「行くぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's go!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部屋からランス達が去って行く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others left the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怠惰の魔人、カミーラは何を思っているのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What was the demon of laziness, Camilla, thinking?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気だるげに一人の部屋で俯いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She sat listlessly alone in her room, looking down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「げはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gehahaha ha ha ha ha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスは自室でシャリエラを相手に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kebris, in his room, was talking to Shaliera,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思い出話を一方的に語っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: recounting memories in a one-sided fashion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王ククルククル、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Demon Lord Kukurukukuru,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間違いなく俺様が知る限り最強の魔王だが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: without a doubt the strongest Demon Lord I know...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その天下も終わりを告げるときが来た」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The time came to mark the end of his reign.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――魔王ククルククルを倒したドラゴン、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—The dragon who defeated Demon Lord Kukurukukuru,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王アベルの誕生だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the birth of Demon Lord Abel."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王ってなぁ死なねぇんだと思ってた俺には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought Demon Lords never died, so for me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その新しい世界の支配者は衝撃なんてもんじゃなかったぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the emergence of that new ruler of the world was nothing short of shocking."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっと、誤解すんじゃねーぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, don't get me wrong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アベルがククルククルより強かったわけじゃねえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Abel wasn't stronger than Kukurukukuru."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ククルククルはドラゴン種全てと戦っていて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kukurukukuru fought all kinds of dragons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまたまアベルがトドメを刺したってだけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Abel just happened to deliver the finishing blow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでもアベルも想像もつかない程に強かったぜ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Still, Abel was unimaginably strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、魔王としちゃ色々と変な奴だったがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, he was a weird guy in many ways for a Demon Lord."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「歴代の魔王でも最高に狡猾で臆病だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He was the craftiest and most cowardly among all Demon Lords in history.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へへっ、だが、俺はそれは正しいと思ったぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh, but I thought that was the right way to be."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんたって、世の中、ククルククルだって死ぬんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After all, even Kukurukukuru dies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんならこの世に信じられる絶対のものなんてねえじゃねぇか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So nothing in this world can be absolutely trusted."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ？　ククルククルの仇討ちはしなかったのかだって？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? You ask if I didn't avenge Kukurukukuru?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「馬ー鹿、なんで俺があんなタコの化け物の仇なんぞ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Idiot! Why would I avenge that octopus monster..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様はもちろん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course, I..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐにアベルにすり寄り忠誠を誓ったぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: immediately swayed close to Abel and swore loyalty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様が逆らったところで、なーんの意味もねぇ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There’s no point in opposing him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普通はそうするだろ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Any sane person would do the same, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王アベルには沢山のことを教わったぜ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I learned a lot from Demon Lord Abel..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どんなに強い奴だって死ぬ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No matter how strong someone is, they die..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦いってなぁ、勝てるって確証が得られるまではしねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You fight only when you can be sure you'll win."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「惚れた女は力で手に入れても意味がねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Winning over the woman you love by force is meaningless."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へっ、教わったことはまあ色々だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh, I've learned all sorts of things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アベルは自分の血を分け与えて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Abel shared his own blood,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人の数を増やした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: increasing the number of demons."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様より強い種から生まれた魔人ばかりでなぁ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They were demons born from species stronger than me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃の俺様はまだ魔人と名乗るのもおこがましい弱さだった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and at that time, I was too weak to even call myself a demon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「肩身が狭い……なんてもんじゃねえ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I felt ashamed... that’s an understatement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この頃はまだ毎日が生きるか死ぬかだったぜ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back then, every day was a matter of life or death..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その後も、色んな奴が魔王になった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After that, many different people became Demon Lords."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつしかドラゴンをめっきり見なくなった頃……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the time dragons had become rarely seen...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間なんて意味の分からねぇチビが増えてた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: humans, those incomprehensible little beings, increased."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王スラルや魔王ナイチサはその頃の魔王だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Demon Lord Slal and Demon Lord Naichisa were Demon Lords of that time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様は何代も何代も魔王に仕え続けた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I continued to serve many generations of Demon Lords."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただひたすら強くなりたいと努力し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I simply put all my effort into wanting to become stronger,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毎日逃げ回る日々を送っていた頃……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and lived each day running away..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつの間にか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Before I knew it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様は最古参の魔人になっていた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I had become the longest-serving demon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と言っても強さは中の下、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Though my strength was average to below average,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昔からいるだけってのが自慢の弱っちい奴」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was just a weakling proud of having been around for so long."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「用心に用心を重ねなければ生きていくことすら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I didn't take precautions over precautions,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 到底俺にはできなかった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was no way I could survive..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「生まれてから3000年ほど過ぎた頃……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Around 3000 years after I was born..."
